sentences.sContent: Off to one side, Sticht, Macomber, Jordan, and Kreps huddled to discuss something.
sentences.sCn: 史蒂希特、麦康伯、乔丹和克雷普斯走到一边，私下商量起事情。

sentences.sContent: The president has been huddling with his most senior aides.
sentences.sCn: 总统一直在和他的顶级高级助理们秘密地聚到一起进行商谈。

remMethod.val: 大家聚集在一起(huddle)处理(handle)问题

trans.tranOther: If people huddle in a group, they gather together to discuss something quietly or secretly
a group of people or things that are close together, but not arranged in any particular order, pattern, or system
